trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were 2 other sightings in Los Angeles on or around October 6th 2013
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: sighting detailsfrom balboa park in van nuys, ca. i watched a white orb fly over sparse clouds at a steady speed from north to south. i was laying on my back on the grass in the park. soon thereafter, a larger and brighter orb appeared, flew in an irregular path, would hover and change direction. i observed this object approach from an easterly direction move almost overhead and shift and stall in a zig zag fashion south\ southwesterly direction until it faded from view. as i was leaving the park i noticed a peculiar phenomena: as the sun was setting behind me in the west, i noticed what looked like a "false" sunrise happening in the east. what appeared as rays of light and shadow extending upwards from in front of the san gabriel mountain range. from on top of a hill i took a short video of the phenomen with my camera on my phone. after reviewing the video, i caught something at 9seconds into the video flying from mid left ascending at high velocity. this object appears dark and is moving too fast to be conventional aircraft.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: From the park I spotted a small orb fly over the clouds, soon followed by a larger, brighter, orb that moved irregular and would appear to hold stationery.
